tooltip.object_index_panel:
This is the Object Index Panel, you can browse and search here all craft inputs and results. 
E.g. musical instruments, melodic patterns, composed songs and instruments effects. 

Click on this message to continue

tooltip.navbar: This is the menu bar, from this menu you can access to all the main features actually offered by music.js

tooltip.menu_new: From this option, you can start new creations: song compositions, pattern compositions and custom instruments

tooltip.menu_preferences: From this another option, you can access to complementary features not directly related with crafting. (Not available yet, sorry)

tooltip.menu_help:
This is the most important option for novice users.
From this help menu, you can access a variety of help options in order to get best understanding of the application. 

Click on ? menu to review the available options

tooltip.menu_help_help: This option, is to view a general useful help text

tooltip.menu_help_recipes: This another option, is to access a list of the available recipes
